name: game-dict
description: Management tools of game words IME dictionary

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run ensure:electron && NODE_ENV=production electron .
scripts.build: tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp -r src/renderer/index.html src/renderer/styles dist/renderer/ && mkdir -p dist/renderer/scripts && cp src/renderer/scripts/main.js dist/renderer/scripts/ && cp -r dist-preload/preload/* dist/preload/
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run ensure:electron && NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.test:clean: rm -rf test-data && rm -rf playwright-report && rm -rf test-results
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:clean:db && npm run build && npm run ensure:electron && NODE_ENV=test playwright test --project=electron
scripts.test:e2e:ui: npm run build && npm run ensure:electron && NODE_ENV=test playwright test --ui
scripts.test:e2e:debug: npm run test:clean:db && npm run build && npm run ensure:electron && NODE_ENV=test playwright test --project=electron --headed --debug
scripts.ensure:electron: prebuild-install --runtime=electron --target=$(npx electron --version | sed 's/v//') || npm run rebuild:electron
scripts.postinstall: npm run ensure:electron && npm run fix:biome-permissions
